alert.note: Alert for Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 29 at 4:11AM CST until November 30 at 12:00AM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...MODERATE TO HEAVY SNOW EXPECTED ACROSS PORTIONS OF NORTH CENTRAL WISCONSIN TODAY... .A low pressure system will bring moderate to heavy snowfall to north central Wisconsin, especially from mid-morning through mid-evening. The snow will mix with rain at times. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow, heavy at times, especially from mid-morning through mid-evening. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 8 inches over the northwest part of the county, with lesser amounts farther southeast. * WHERE...Vilas County. * WHEN...Until Midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty west winds later tonight may result in minor blowing and drifting of the snow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
